and.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DUAL WHERE EXISTS(SELECT T.RESOURCEID FROM M1_ROLE_RESOURCES T)

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO M1_ROLE_RESOURCES(AUTHORITY, RESOURCEID) SELECT AUTHORITY, RESOURCEID FROM TM_ROLE_RESOURCES WHERE AUTHORITY NOT IN('ROLE_DEV', 'ROLE_SYSTEM');

changeSet.author: ChenLili

and.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DUAL WHERE EXISTS(SELECT T1.AUTHORITY FROM TM_ROLES T1,M1_ROLES T2 WHERE T1.AUTHORITY = T2.AUTHORITY AND T1.AUTHORITY NOT IN ( 'ROLE_ADMIN', 'ROLE_DEV','ROLE_SYSTEM', 'ROLE_USER', 'ROLE_MANAGER'))

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO M1_ROLES (AUTHORITY, ALIAS, REMARKS) SELECT AUTHORITY, ALIAS, REMARKS FROM TM_ROLES WHERE AUTHORITY NOT IN ('ROLE_ADMIN', 'ROLE_DEV','ROLE_SYSTEM', 'ROLE_USER', 'ROLE_MANAGER');

changeSet.author: ChenLili

and.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DUAL WHERE EXISTS(SELECT T1.USERNAME FROM TM_USERS T1,M1_USERS T2 WHERE T1.USERNAME = T2.USERNAME AND T1.USERNAME NOT IN('13783698404','18537169260', '18595902563'))

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO M1_USERS (USERNAME, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, MOBILE, EMAIL, ENABLED) SELECT USERNAME, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, MOBILE, EMAIL, ENABLED FROM TM_USERS WHERE USERNAME NOT IN('13783698404','18537169260', '18595902563');

changeSet.author: ChenLili

and.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DUAL WHERE EXISTS(SELECT T1.USERID FROM TM_USER_ROLES T1,M1_USER_ROLES T2 WHERE T1.USERID = T2.USERID AND T1.USERID NOT IN('13783698404','18537169260', '18595902563'))

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO M1_USER_ROLES (USERID, AUTHORITY) SELECT USERID, AUTHORITY FROM TM_USER_ROLES WHERE USERID NOT IN('13783698404','18537169260', '18595902563');

changeSet.author: ChenLili

and.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DUAL WHERE EXISTS(SELECT T1.ID FROM TM_ORGANIZATION T1, M1_ORGANIZATION T2 WHERE T1.ID = T2.ID AND T1.ID NOT IN ('YgW06azM', 'JsQdTpIA', 'tlouU3k4', '49nt9ifh', '45NSxb6g'))

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO M1_ORGANIZATION (ID, ORGANIZATION, ALIAS, PARENTID, RANK, REMARKS) SELECT ID, ORGANIZATION, ALIAS, PARENTID, LEVEL AS RANK, REMARKS FROM TM_ORGANIZATION WHERE ID NOT IN('YgW06azM', 'JsQdTpIA', 'tlouU3k4', '49nt9ifh', '45NSxb6g');

changeSet.author: ChenLili

and.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DUAL WHERE EXISTS(SELECT T1.ID FROM TM_ORGANIZATION T1, M1_ORGANIZATION T2 WHERE T1.ID = T2.ID AND T1.ID NOT IN ('YgW06azM', 'JsQdTpIA', 'tlouU3k4', '49nt9ifh', '45NSxb6g'))

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO M1_ORGANIZATION (ID, ORGANIZATION, ALIAS, PARENTID, RANK, REMARKS) SELECT ID, ORGANIZATION, ALIAS, PARENTID, RANK, REMARKS FROM TM_ORGANIZATION WHERE ID NOT IN('YgW06azM', 'JsQdTpIA', 'tlouU3k4', '49nt9ifh', '45NSxb6g');

changeSet.author: ChenLili

and.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DUAL WHERE EXISTS(SELECT T1.ORGANIZATIONID FROM TM_USER_ORGANIZATION T1, M1_USER_ORGANIZATION T2 WHERE T1.USERID = T2.USERID AND T1.USERID NOT IN ('13783698404','18537169260', '18595902563'))

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO M1_USER_ORGANIZATION (USERID, ORGANIZATIONID) SELECT USERID, ORGANIZATIONID FROM TM_USER_ORGANIZATION WHERE USERID NOT IN('13783698404','18537169260', '18595902563');
